nodes.text: Kosimas was a male Nothoiin who lived on Anoat. During the Iron Blockade, he tried to escape Earl Alner's rule, and was rescued by Corto Belrake and a young smuggler. He was later imprisoned on Pujool by Imperial purge troopers, and rescued again by the Smuggler.
Kosimas is a non-player character created for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon mobile game developed by Kabam for iOS and Android operating systems.
